Key Match Events: England won by 8 wickets with 15 balls remaining
Pre-Game Insights: Jos Buttler won the toss and elected to bowl first
West Indies made two changes with Roston Chase and Romario Shepherd replacing Shai Hope and Obed McCoy respectively
Mark Wood returned for Chris Jordan in England's lineup
Post-Match Reflections: England's pursuit began steadily enough, reaching 58 for no loss after six overs
Salt's 87 not out and Bairstow's 48* ensured a comfortable victory for England
Miscellaneous Highlights: Adil Rashid picked up 1 for 21 from his four overs
Rovman Powell promoted himself up the order to No.4
Others: Weather conditions were fine for play
The match took place at the Daren Sammy National Stadium in Gros Islet
